# Invitation to Submit an Expression of Interest for Space Lease in Oakville and Burlington, Ontario
### Solicitation Information
| Key | Value | 
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | 81001956-1 |
| Amendment Number | 4 |
| Publication Date | February 1, 2024 |
| Tender Closing Date | February 15, 2024, 17:00:00 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | None |
| Expected Contract End Date | None |
| Category | SRV: Real Estate Services |

### Tender Information
| Key | Value | 
| --- | --- |
| PROCUREMENT METHOD | Competitive - Open Bidding |
| PROCUREMENT CATEGORY-COMMERCIALIZATION MODALITY | Other methods or variations thereof |

### Important Dates
* The tender closing date is February 15, 2024, at 17:00:00 EST.
* Please consult the latest tender amendments for up-to-date information.

### Solicitation Description
Public Services and Procurement Canada is inviting contractors to submit an Expression of Interest (EOI) for space lease in Oakville and Burlington, Ontario. 

### Contact Information

* Contractor: Public Services and Procurement Canada
* Address: 10th floor, 4900 Yonge Street, Toronto, Ontario M2N6A6, Canada
* Phone: (416) 995-1590
* Fax: (416) 952-6481
* Email: [Vaylon.Fernandes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Vaylon.Fernandes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Contact Person: Vaylon Fernandes

### Documents

* English attachment: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30879/81001956-1---eoi---oakville-and-burlington---canadabuys---en.pdf
* French attachment: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30879/81001956-1---eoi---oakville-and-burlington---achatscanada---fr.pdf

### Note
This tender is closed to other solicitations. Please refer to the above-mentioned attachments for more information and a detailed explanation of the requirements. It is recommended that interested contractors review the tender documents thoroughly to ensure adherence to Canadian procurement regulations.  I made sure to exclude language that appears redundant,
